body: The fuck? This is actually damn good. I'm not even horny anymore I'm just thinking about life now
The hell is Junji Ito doing here?

In the end she was only a whore of materialism, selling her body for some big apartment and betraying her artistic vision for higher sells. In a city where prostitution and exploitation are a daily occurrence, she sold herself as well. She's a failed manga artist and in the end even a failed human being. Nippon taro and Tokyo Rose are quite right to mock her.
beautiful, horrible, ultimately kind of baffling, but damn the art is nice. somehing kind of sad about reading this kind of stuff in 2021 tho. "those were different times..."

go work as a mangaka or an animator you nut. wth are you doing on nhentai. i know there are alot of good hentai artists that do it for fun but this is an elite art style. even if its a one-shot, try somrthing mainstream.
